1.text: Slice 4 plantains into 1 in (2.5 cm) pieces.

2.text: Heat up a frying pan with 3⁄4  c (180 mL) of cooking oil.

3.text: Cook the plantain slices in the oil until they look brown.

4.text: Transfer the fried plantains to a separate plate.

5.text: Heat up 1⁄4  c (59 mL) of oil in a large pot.

6.text: Brown 5 US tbsp (42 g) of minced garlic in the oil.

7.text: Cook 3 lb (1.4 kg) of cubed pork for 8-10 minutes.

8.text: Add extra seasonings and wait for everything to boil.

9.text: Let everything cook until the pork is tender.

10.text: Mix in 1⁄2  c (120 mL) of vinegar and let it simmer for 5 minutes.

11.text: Stir in carrots and brown sugar for 10 minutes.

12.text: Pour the estofado onto a plate and top it off with fried plantains.
